Name: Zenko: A Fox's Tale
About the game: Zenko: A Fox's tale is a 3D adventure platformer that takes place in a Japanese inspired environment. A whimsical fox must move between realms to capture wandering spirits, discover new abilities, and restore an abandoned shrine. Features Beautiful environments based off the art and nature of Japan 3 levels to explore Quick and responsive platforming gameplay several secrets to discover Bonus artwork and levels from finding secrets A very cute fox and some very cute spirits Extra Background Zenko: A Fox's Tale was created by an indie development team of graduate students from the Florida Interactive Entertainment Academy (FIEA). Over the course of 7 months, the team built Zenko from the ground up, brainstorming to release. We welcome any feedback that can be used to improve the game, and hope that everyone who plays has a great time!
